Defined in src/app/melding-detail/melding-detail.component.ts:58
 
import { ArchiveService } from './../services/archive.service';
import { ConfirmDialogService } from './../shared/confirm-dialog.service';


import {
  Component,
  OnInit,
  HostListener,
  ViewEncapsulation,
  ViewChild

} from '@angular/core';
import { ReportService } from '../services/report.service';
import { Report, AzureUser, Campus, Status } from '../models/Report';
import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router';
import { AuthService } from '../auth-service/auth.service';
import { MatTabChangeEvent, MatTabGroup } from '@angular/material';
import { UpVoteService } from '../services/upvote/up-vote.service';
import { ToastrService } from 'ngx-toastr';
import { Location } from '@angular/common';
import { CategoryService } from '../services/category.service';
import { CompressorService } from '../services/Compressor.service';
import { map, expand } from 'rxjs/operators';
import { EMPTY } from 'rxjs';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-melding-detail',
  templateUrl: './melding-detail.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./melding-detail.component.css'],
})
export class MeldingDetailComponent implements OnInit {
  departments = [
    'Facilitaire diensten',
    'ICT diensten',
    'Herstellingen Didactisch materiaal',
  ];

  groupMemberObject: AzureUser;
  emplyeesList: AzureUser[] = [];
  assignToUserInformation: AzureUser;
  id: string;
  report: Report;
  reporterId: string;
  reportId: string;
  public LogedInUser: string;
  isLoaded: boolean;
  campus = Campus;
  campusesList = [];
  status = Status;
  statusList = [];
  Categories: String[] = [];
  selectedFile: File;
  fileName: string;
  newInnerWidth;
  adjustable = false;
  public isGeaboneerd;
  public selectedIndex;
  UserID = localStorage.getItem('UserID');
  constructor(
    private route: ActivatedRoute,
    private reportService: ReportService,
    public authService: AuthService,
    private toastr: ToastrService,
    private upVoteService: UpVoteService,
    private _location: Location,
    private categoryService: CategoryService,
    private compressor: CompressorService,
    private dialogService: ConfirmDialogService,
    private archiveService: ArchiveService,
    private router: Router
  ) {}

  data: FileList;
  GroupNames: any;
  compressedImages = [];

  ngOnInit() {
    this.reporterId = localStorage.getItem('UserID');
    this.id = this.route.snapshot.paramMap.get('id');
    this.LogedInUser = localStorage.getItem('UserID');
    this.getReport();
    this.getAllUsers();
    this.campusesList = Object.keys(this.campus);
    this.newInnerWidth = window.innerWidth;
    this.statusList = Object.values(this.status);

    const index = localStorage.getItem('userTabLocationDetails') || 0; // get stored number or zero if there is nothing stored
    const indexNr = +index;

    this.selectedIndex = indexNr; // with tabGroup being the MatTabGroup accessed through ViewChild
    this.selectedIndex  = indexNr;
  }

  recursiveCompress = (image: File, index, array) => {
    return this.compressor.compress(image).pipe(
      map((response) => {
        // Code block after completing each compression
        console.log('compressed ' + index + image.name);
        this.compressedImages.push(response);
        return {
          data: response,
          index: index + 1,
          array,
        };
      })
    );
  }

  public process(event) {
    this.data = event.target.files;
    this.fileName = event.target.files[0].name;
    console.log('input: ' + this.data[0]);
    const compress = this.recursiveCompress(this.data[0], 0, this.data).pipe(
      expand((res) => {
        return res.index > res.array.length - 1
          ? EMPTY
          : this.recursiveCompress(this.data[res.index], res.index, this.data);
      })
    );
    compress.subscribe((res) => {
      if (res.index > res.array.length - 1) {
        // Code block after completing all compression
        console.log('Compression successful ' + this.compressedImages);
      }
    });
  }

  @HostListener('window:resize', ['$event'])
  onResize(event) {
    this.newInnerWidth = event.target.innerWidth;
    this.statusList = Object.values(this.status);
  }

  /**
   * we krijgen bij dit methode een lijst met alle users en we voegen die users aan employees array om
   *te tonen als opties voor select
   */
  getAllUsers() {
    this.authService.getUsersList().subscribe((test) => {
      test.value.forEach((element) => {
        this.assignToUserInformation = {
          AzureUserId: element.id,
          displayName: element.displayName,
        };
        this.emplyeesList.push(this.assignToUserInformation);
      });
    });
  }

  /**
   * als de user een employee geselecteerd heeft van de select opties, dan nemen we hier het id en naam van de geselecteerd employee
   * @param e heeft informatie over de geselecteerde optie
   */
  onChange(e) {
    this.assignToUserInformation = {
      AzureUserId: e.target.value,
      displayName: e.target.options[e.target.options.selectedIndex].text,
    };
  }

  /**
   * bij dit methode we call een methode van onze authservice en we pass 3 parameters: de ingelodgd user id, de id van de employee die we willen
   * een report aan hem toewijzen, een de report id, en wordt de report toegewijzen aan de gespecifieerd employee.
   */
  getSelectedAssignedUserInformation() {
    this.reportService
      .assignReportToEmplyee(
        this.assignToUserInformation,
        this.reporterId,
        this.id
      )
      .subscribe(
        (result) => {
          this.toastr.success(
            `defect is succefully toegevoegd aan ${this.assignToUserInformation.displayName}`
          );
        },
        (error) => {
          this.toastr.success('er is een error');
        }
      );
  }

  getReport() {
    this.reportService.getReport(this.id).subscribe((data) => {
      if (data !== null) {
        this.report = data;

        this.getCategoryByDepartment();
        this.isLoaded = true;
        data.subscribers.forEach((element) => {
          if (element === this.UserID) {
            this.isGeaboneerd = true;
          }
      });
        // this.isGeaboneerd = !this.isGeaboneerd;
      } else {
        this.isLoaded = false;
      }
    });
  }

  updateReport() {
    if (this.report.status === 'Wordt niet uitgevoerd' || this.report.status === 'Voltooid') {
      this.whenReportNotDoneOrDone(this.report.status);
      console.log("test status")
    } else {
      this.reportService
      .updateReport(this.report, this.compressedImages)
      .subscribe(
        (res) => {
          this.toastr.success('De melding werd gewijzigd.', 'Succes!');
          location.reload();
        },
        (error) => {
          this.toastr.error('Er is een fout opgetreden.', 'Error!');
        }
      );
    }


  }

  /**
   *
   * @param priority Returneert de gepaste kleur voor de Priority Button gebaseerd op de prioriteitswaarde.
   */
  setPriorityColor(priority): String {
    switch (priority) {
      case 'HIGH':
        return '#af0412'; // Red
      case 'NORMAL':
        return '#ffa500'; // Orange
      case 'LOW':
        return '#28a745'; // Green
    }
  }

  /**
   * deze function call backend function om Alle  Categorie vanuit database te halen
   *
   */
  getCategoryByDepartment() {
    this.categoryService
      .getCategoriesBydepartment(this.report.categoryDepartment)
      .subscribe(
        (res) => {
          // console.log(res[0].categories);
          this.Categories = res[0].categories;
        },
        (error) => {
          console.log(error);
        }
      );
  }

  onDepartmentChange(e) {
    console.log(e.target.value);
    const department = e.target.value;
    this.categoryService.getCategoriesBydepartment(department).subscribe(
      (res) => {
        // console.log(res[0].categories);
        this.Categories = res[0].categories;
      },
      (error) => {
        console.log(error);
      }
    );
  }

  /**
   * functie zal de UpvoteService aanroepen en een het huidige report object meegeven
   *
   */
  subscription() {
    this.report.subscribers.forEach((element) => {
        if (element === this.UserID) {
          this.isGeaboneerd = true;
        }
    });
    this.isGeaboneerd = !this.isGeaboneerd;

    this.upVoteService.updateUserVote(this.report);
    console.log('is Geaboneerd = ' + this.isGeaboneerd);
  }
  goBack() {
    this._location.back();
  }

  handleMatTabChange(event: MatTabChangeEvent) {
    localStorage.setItem('userTabLocationDetails', event.index.toString());
    console.log(event.index);
  }


  /**
   * deze function annuleert het report en stuurt het naar de archief
   * als de gebruiker accepteert dat
   */

  onCancleReport() {
    this.dialogService.openConfirmDialog('Weet u zeker dat u dit defect wilt annuleren? Deze actie kan niet ongedaan worden gemaakt')
    .afterClosed().subscribe(res => {
      // console.log(res)
      if (res) {
         // Update


         this.report.status = this.status.DISCARDED;
         this.reportService
         .updateReport(this.report, this.compressedImages)
         .subscribe(
           (res) => {
             this.toastr.success('De melding werd gewijzigd.', 'Succes!');
             location.reload();
           }
         );
        // annuleren
         this.moveReportToArchive();
         this.deleteReport();
         this.toastr.success('Het defect word gearchiveerd');
         this.router.navigate(['/']);

      }
    });
  }
  whenReportNotDoneOrDone(status:String) {
    this.dialogService.openConfirmDialog('Weet u zeker dat u de status van dit defect wilt wijzigen naar (' + status + ') ? Deze actie kan niet ongedaan worden gemaakt')
    .afterClosed().subscribe(res => {
      // console.log(res)
      if (res) {
        // Update
        this.reportService
        .updateReport(this.report, this.compressedImages)
        .subscribe(
          (res) => {
            this.toastr.success('De melding werd gewijzigd.', 'Succes!');
            location.reload();
          }
        );
        // annuleren
         this.moveReportToArchive();
         this.deleteReport();
         this.toastr.success('Het defect word gearchiveerd');
         this.router.navigate(['/']);

      }
    });
  }

  moveReportToArchive() {
    this.archiveService.moveReportToArchive(this.report).subscribe(res => {

    });
  }

  deleteReport() {
    this.reportService.deleteReport(this.report.id).subscribe(res => {

    });
  }
}

<div class="container" *ngIf='isLoaded'>
    <!-- Desktop -->
    <div class="row desktop" [hidden]='newInnerWidth < 500'>
        <!-- Algemeen -->
        <div id='general' class="col-4">
            <h4>{{report.title}}</h4>
            <p>{{report.campus}} {{report.location}}</p>

            <div id='info-top'>
                <span id='category'>{{report.category}}</span>
                <span id='priority'>
                    <p>{{report.upVote}} meldingen</p>
                    <span class='dot' [ngStyle]="{'background-color': setPriorityColor(report.priority)}"></span>
                </span>
            </div>

            <div id="info-bottom">
                <div class="info-bottom-user">
                    <p><span class="material-icons">account_circle</span>{{report.reporterName}}</p>
                    <p><span class="material-icons">alarm</span>{{report.createdOn}}</p>
                </div>

                <!-- <button (click)='subscription()' id='btnSubscribe'>+</button> -->
                <i [ngStyle]="{'color':isGeaboneerd? 'green' : '#af0412' }" style='cursor:pointer;
                ' class="fas fa-thumbs-up plusIcon" aria-hidden="true" (click)="subscription()"></i>
            </div>

            <div *ngFor='let s of report.statusHistory.reverse()' class="status mb-1">
                <h5>Statuswijziging</h5>
                <p>{{s}}</p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Tabs -->
        <div class="col-4">
            <mat-tab-group #tabGroup (selectedTabChange)="handleMatTabChange($event)" [selectedIndex]='selectedIndex'>
                <mat-tab label='Reacties'></mat-tab>

                <mat-tab label='Wijzigen'>
                    <form #updateForm='ngForm'>
                        <div class="form-group">
                            <label id='lblTitle' for="title">Titel</label>
                            <input #title="ngModel" [(ngModel)]="report.title" type="text" class="form-control" id="title" name="title" required/>
                            <div class="alert alert-danger" *ngIf="title.invalid && (title.dirty || title.touched)">Title is required</div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="form-group">
                            <label for="description">Beschrijving</label>
                            <textarea #description="ngModel" [(ngModel)]="report.description" type="text" class="form-control" id="description" name="description" row="3" required></textarea>
                            <div class="alert alert-danger" *ngIf="description.invalid && (description.dirty || description.touched)">Description is required</div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="form-group">
                            <label for="location col-md-7">Locatie</label>
                            <input #location="ngModel" [(ngModel)]="report.location" type="text" class="form-control" id="location" name="location" required/>
                            <div class="alert alert-danger" *ngIf="location.invalid && (location.dirty || location.touched)">location is required</div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="form-group">
                            <label for="campus col-md-4">Campus</label>
                            <select #campus="ngModel" [(ngModel)]="report.campus" name="campus" id="campus" class="form-control" required>
                                <option *ngFor="let key of campusesList"  [value]="key" [label]="key">{{key}}</option>
                            </select>
                        </div>
                        <div class="form-group">
                            <label for="department">Department</label>
                            <select id="department" name="department" #department="ngModel" [(ngModel)]="report.categoryDepartment" class="form-control" required (change)="onDepartmentChange($event)" placeholder="kies een afdeling">
                            <option selected disabled>kiezen...</option>
                            <option  *ngFor="let d of departments" [value]="d">{{d}}</option>

                           </select>
                            <div class="alert alert-danger" *ngIf="department.invalid && (department.dirty || department.touched)">Department is required</div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="form-group">
                            <label for="category">Categorie</label>
                            <select #category="ngModel" [(ngModel)]="report.category" id="category" name="category" class="form-control" required>
                                <option  *ngFor="let c of Categories" [value]="c">{{c}}</option>
                            </select>
                            <div class="alert alert-danger" *ngIf="category.invalid && (category.dirty || category.touched)">Categorie is required</div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="form-group">
                            <div class="custom-file">
                                <input type="file" class="custom-file-input" id='image' (change)="process($event)" />
                                <label class="custom-file-label" for="image">{{fileName}}</label>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <button id='confirm' (click)="updateReport()" [disabled]="!updateForm.valid || report.status != 'Wachten op ontvangst door facilitaire diensten'  || report.reporterId !== LogedInUser" class="btn">UPDATEN</button>
                    </form>
                </mat-tab>

                <mat-tab *ngIf="authService.isAdmin || authService.isFacilitaireCoordinator" label='Toewijzen'>
                    <select (change)="onChange($event)" name="employee" id="employee" class="form-control mt-2">
                        <option selected="true" disabled="disabled">Choose Employee</option>
                        <option *ngFor="let employee of emplyeesList" [value]="employee.AzureUserId" [label]="employee.displayName">{{employee.displayName}}</option>
                    </select>

                    <button id='confirm' class="btn mt-2" (click)="getSelectedAssignedUserInformation()">Assign Employee</button>
                </mat-tab>

                <mat-tab *ngIf="authService.isAdmin || authService.isFacilitaireCoordinator" label='Statussen'>
                    <p class='m-0 pt-1 pb-1'>Status wijzigen</p>

                    <form #statusForm="ngForm" class='mb-1'>
                        <select #category="ngModel" [(ngModel)]="report.status" id="status" name="status" class="form-control" required>
                            <option  *ngFor="let s of statusList" [value]="s">{{s}}</option>
                            <div class="alert alert-danger" *ngIf="category.invalid && (category.dirty || category.touched)">Status is required</div>
                        </select>

                        <button id='confirm' (click)="updateReport()" class="btn mt-2">UPDATEN</button>
                    </form>
                </mat-tab>
            </mat-tab-group>
        </div>

        <!-- Foto -->
        <div id='photo' class="col-4">
            <img id='img-web' *ngIf='report.bytes === null' src="../../assets/images/default.jpg" alt="image">
            <img id='img-web' *ngIf='report.bytes !== null' src="data:image/jpeg;base64,{{report.bytes}}" alt="image">

            <div class="p-0 m-2 row">
                <mat-icon class="col-xs-2" style='font-size: 18px;'>build</mat-icon>
                <span class="col-xs-10">{{report.assignTo.displayName}}</span>
            </div>
            <div class="p-0 m-2 row">
                <span class="mt-2 p-0 col-xs-12">{{report.description}}</span>

            </div>
            <div class="p-0 m-2 row">
                <button class="btn-aanuleren col-xs-3" (click)="onCancleReport()">Annuleren</button>
            </div>





        </div>

        <div id="return" (click)='goBack()'>
            <i class="fa fa-undo m-2" aria-hidden="true"></i>
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Mobile -->
    <div class="row" [hidden]='newInnerWidth >= 500'>
        <!-- Algemeen foto -->
        <main *ngIf='report.bytes === null' style="background-image: url('../../assets/images/default.jpg')" alt="image">
            <div class="info-mobile">
                <h4>{{report.title}}</h4>
                <p>{{report.campus}} {{report.location}}</p>
            </div>
        </main>

        <!-- Aangepaste foto -->
        <main *ngIf='report.bytes !== null' [ngStyle]="{'background-image':'url(data:image/jpeg;base64,'+report.bytes+')'}">
            <div class="info-mobile">
                <h4>{{report.title}}</h4>
                <p>{{report.campus}} {{report.location}}</p>
            </div>
        </main>

        <div id='info-top' class='p-3'>
            <span id='category'>{{report.category}}</span>
            <span id='priority'>
                <p>{{report.upVote}} meldingen</p>
                <span class='dot' [ngStyle]="{'background-color': setPriorityColor(report.priority)}"></span>
            </span>
        </div>

        <div id="info-bottom-mobile" class='p-3'>
            <div class="info-bottom-user">
                <p><span class="material-icons">account_circle</span>{{report.reporterName}}</p>
                <p><span class="material-icons">alarm</span>{{report.createdOn}}</p>
                <p><span class="material-icons">build</span>{{report.assignTo.displayName}}</p>

            </div>

            <!-- <button (click)='subscription()' id='btnSubscribe'>+</button> -->
            <div>
                <i [ngStyle]="{'color':isGeaboneerd? 'green' : '#af0412' }" class="fas fa-thumbs-up plusIcon-mobile" aria-hidden="true" (click)="subscription()"></i>
                <div>
                    <mat-icon class="cancleIcon-mobile" (click)="onCancleReport()">cancel</mat-icon>
                </div>
            </div>

        </div>

        <div id="tab-mobile" class="col-11">
            <mat-tab-group #tabGroup2 (selectedTabChange)="handleMatTabChange($event)" [selectedIndex]='selectedIndex'>
                <mat-tab label='Beschrijving'>
                    <p class='mt-2'>{{report.description}}</p>
                </mat-tab>

                <mat-tab label='Reacties'></mat-tab>

                <mat-tab label='Wijzigen'>
                    <form #updateFormMobile='ngForm'>
                        <div class="form-group">
                            <label id='lblTitle' for="title">Titel</label>
                            <input #title="ngModel" [(ngModel)]="report.title" type="text" class="form-control" id="title" name="title" required/>
                            <div class="alert alert-danger" *ngIf="title.invalid && (title.dirty || title.touched)">Title is required</div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="form-group">
                            <label for="description">Beschrijving</label>
                            <textarea #description="ngModel" [(ngModel)]="report.description" type="text" class="form-control" id="description" name="description" row="3" required></textarea>
                            <div class="alert alert-danger" *ngIf="description.invalid && (description.dirty || description.touched)">Description is required</div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="form-group">
                            <label for="location col-md-7">Locatie</label>
                            <input #location="ngModel" [(ngModel)]="report.location" type="text" class="form-control" id="location" name="location" required/>
                            <div class="alert alert-danger" *ngIf="location.invalid && (location.dirty || location.touched)">location is required</div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="form-group">
                            <label for="campus col-md-4">Campus</label>
                            <select #campus="ngModel" [(ngModel)]="report.campus" name="campus" id="campus" class="form-control" required>
                                <option *ngFor="let key of campusesList"  [value]="key" [label]="key">{{key}}</option>
                            </select>
                        </div>
                        <div class="form-group">
                            <label for="department">Department</label>
                            <select id="department" name="department" #department="ngModel" [(ngModel)]="report.categoryDepartment" class="form-control" required (change)="onDepartmentChange($event)" placeholder="kies een afdeling">
                          <option selected disabled>kiezen...</option>
                          <option  *ngFor="let d of departments" [value]="d">{{d}}</option>

                         </select>
                            <div class="alert alert-danger" *ngIf="department.invalid && (department.dirty || department.touched)">Department is required</div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="form-group">
                            <label for="category">Categorie</label>
                            <select #category="ngModel" [(ngModel)]="report.category" id="category" name="category" class="form-control" required>
                                <option  *ngFor="let c of Categories" [value]="c">{{c}}</option>
                            </select>
                            <div class="alert alert-danger" *ngIf="category.invalid && (category.dirty || category.touched)">Categorie is required</div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="form-group">
                            <div class="custom-file">
                                <input type="file" class="custom-file-input" id='image' (change)="process($event)" />
                                <label class="custom-file-label" for="image">{{fileName}}</label>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <button id='confirm' (click)="updateReport()" [disabled]="!updateFormMobile.valid || report.status != 'Wachten op ontvangst door facilitaire diensten'" class="btn">UPDATEN</button>
                    </form>
                </mat-tab>

                <mat-tab *ngIf="authService.isAdmin || authService.isFacilitaireCoordinator " label='Toewijzen'>
                    <select (change)="onChange($event)" name="employee" id="employee" class="form-control mt-2">
                        <option selected="true" disabled="disabled">Choose Employee</option>
                        <option *ngFor="let employee of emplyeesList" [value]="employee.AzureUserId" [label]="employee.displayName">{{employee.displayName}}</option>
                    </select>

                    <button id='confirm' class="btn mt-2" (click)="getSelectedAssignedUserInformation()">Assign Employee</button>
                </mat-tab>

                <mat-tab *ngIf="authService.isAdmin || authService.isFacilitaireMedewerker" label='Statussen'>

                    <p class='m-0 pt-1 pb-1'>Status wijzigen</p>

                    <form #statusFormMobile="ngForm" class='mb-1'>
                        <select #category="ngModel" [(ngModel)]="report.status" id="status" name="status" class="form-control" required>
                            <option  *ngFor="let s of statusList" [value]="s">{{s}}</option>
                            <div class="alert alert-danger" *ngIf="category.invalid && (category.dirty || category.touched)">Categorie is required</div>
                        </select>

                        <button id='confirm' (click)="updateReport()" class="btn mt-2">UPDATEN</button>
                    </form>

                    <div *ngFor='let s of report.statusHistory' class="status mb-1">
                        <h5>Statuswijziging</h5>
                        <p>{{s}}</p>
                    </div>
                    <span class="mb-3 d-block"></span>
                </mat-tab>
            </mat-tab-group>
        </div>

        <div id="return" (click)='goBack()'>
            <i class="fa fa-undo m-2" aria-hidden="true"></i>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

/* Desktop */

    margin-top: 60px;
}

    border-right: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, .12);
}

    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    width: 100%;
}

    border: 0.5px solid gray;
    border-radius: 8px;
    padding: 5px;
}

    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
}

    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
}
